Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Penn in 1983...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1984, off William Carolan (PIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/15/1984, off Jaime Lucky (CC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1984, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1985, hitting .632 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Hit for the cycle against Coney Island on 4/25/1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1985, hitting .520 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1985, hitting .430 with 6 HR, 26 RBI...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
